author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Jayalalithaa-led Tamil Nadu government should declare total prohibition in the State during the ongoing last Assembly session, Bharatiya Janata Party president Tamilisai Soundararajan has said.

Speaking to reporters here on Wednesday evening , Dr. Tamilisai said that the State, having witnessed the evils of liquor for the past several decades, was desperately waiting to hear the announcement on total prohibition.

On the BJP’s efforts to form an electoral alliance, she said that the party was holding talks with a few friendly partners and a people-friendly alliance with stronger partners would be formed as early as possible.

Poll preparation

“BJP’s national president Amit Shahhas already deputed two senior ministers to monitor the party’s poll preparations. As Mr. Shah has already ensured the BJP’s resounding victory in several States , he will also take the BJP to power in Tamil Nadu,” Dr. Tamilisai said. She also said that the Centre was helping Tamil Nadu in several ways, especially during the flood relief operations and by giving additional power to tide over the present crisis.
title: Declare total prohibition: Tamilisai
